languages.text: "Мне просто претит мысль, что такой великий человек оставил после себя свалку человеческого мусора и ничего больше. Его сын — пьяница и слабак. Его "друг" Дэгген — тот, что встречал вас на входе, — громила-тугодум с невероятным самомнением. Его вдова укатила на семейной яхте в сторону Зева, когда его тело еще не остыло, — со свитой из пяти мускулистых молодчиков приятной наружности".

"It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."
languages.original_text: "Мне просто претит мысль, что такой великий человек оставил после себя свалку человеческого мусора и ничего больше. Его сын — пьяница и слабак. Его "друг" Дэгген — тот, что встречал вас на входе, — громила-тугодум с невероятным самомнением. Его вдова укатила на семейной яхте в сторону Зева, когда его тело еще не остыло, — со свитой из пяти мускулистых молодчиков приятной наружности".

traits.locale_text: "It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His sun is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dimwitted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking fellows."

"It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."

languages.text: “只不过，一想到这么伟大的人只留下了这么一群人渣，我就感到恶心。他的儿子是个酒鬼，还是个软脚虾。他的‘朋友’达根，就是在门口迎接你的那个人，他是个蠢货，而且极度自我膨胀。他的遗孀还在他尸骨未寒的时候，就乘着家族的游艇，朝‘巨口’的方向去了。和她同行的还有五个年轻小伙子，面貌英俊，体格魁梧。”
languages.original_text: "It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."

traits.locale_text: “只不过，一想到这么伟大的人只留下了这么一群人渣，我就感到恶心。他的儿子是个酒鬼，还是个软脚虾。他的‘朋友’达根，就是在门口迎接你的那个人，他是个蠢货，而且极度自我膨胀。他的遗孀还在他尸骨未寒的时候，就乘着家族的游艇，朝‘巨口’的方向去了。和她同行的还有五个年轻小伙子，面貌英俊，体格魁梧。”

languages.text: «Es solo que me pone enfermo la idea de que un hombre tan magnífico no haya dejado atrás nada más que un montón de basura humana. Su hijo es un borracho enclenque. Su "amigo" Daggen, el mismo que os recibió en la entrada, es un bruto imbécil con un ego inmenso. Su viuda se largó en el yate familiar hacia las Fauces antes de que se enfriara su cuerpo... con un séquito de cinco hombres fuertes y guapos».
languages.original_text: "It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."

traits.locale_text: «Es solo que me pone enfermo la idea de que un hombre tan magnífico no haya dejado atrás nada más que un montón de basura humana. Su hijo es un borracho enclenque. Su "amigo" Daggen, el mismo que os recibió en la entrada, es un bruto imbécil con un ego inmenso. Su viuda se largó en el yate familiar hacia las Fauces antes de que se enfriara su cuerpo... con un séquito de cinco hombres fuertes y guapos».

languages.text: 「ただ、あのような偉大な男がクズような人間を山ほど生産しただけと考えると気分が悪くなります。彼の息子は酔っ払いの根性なし。入り口であなたをお迎えした彼の『友人』であるダゲンは頭の悪い野蛮人で、酷い自尊心の持ち主です。彼の未亡人は、彼の遺体がまだ温かいうちに5人の屈強な好青年たちを従え、一家のヨットでマウの方角に向かいました」
languages.original_text: "It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ、あのような偉大な男がクズような人間を山ほど生産しただけと考えると気分が悪くなります。彼の息子は酔っ払いの根性なし。入り口であなたをお迎えした彼の『友人』であるダゲンは頭の悪い野蛮人で、酷い自尊心の持ち主です。彼の未亡人は、彼の遺体がまだ温かいうちに5人の屈強な好青年たちを従え、一家のヨットでマウの方角に向かいました」

languages.text: "Mich macht einfach der Gedanke krank, dass ein so großer Mann nur einen Haufen menschlichen Abfall zurücklässt. Sein Sohn ist ein Trunkenbold und ein Schwächling. Sein 'Freund' Daggen – der Euch am Eingang begrüßt hat – ist ein dummer Schläger mit unglaublich aufgeblasenem Ego. Seine Witwe hat sich mit der Familienjacht Richtung Schlund abgesetzt, als die Leiche noch warm war – zusammen mit fünf muskulösen, gutaussehenden jungen Männern."
languages.original_text: "It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."

traits.locale_text: "Mich macht einfach der Gedanke krank, dass ein so großer Mann nur einen Haufen menschlichen Abfall zurücklässt. Sein Sohn ist ein Trunkenbold und ein Schwächling. Sein 'Freund' Daggen – der Euch am Eingang begrüßt hat – ist ein dummer Schläger mit unglaublich aufgeblasenem Ego. Seine Witwe hat sich mit der Familienjacht Richtung Schlund abgesetzt, als die Leiche noch warm war – zusammen mit fünf muskulösen, gutaussehenden jungen Männern."

languages.text: « Ça me rend malade de voir qu'un homme d'une telle trempe n'a laissé derrière lui qu'un tas de rebuts de l'humanité. Son fils est un ivrogne dépourvu du moindre courage. Daggen, son soi-disant ami qui vous a {mf|accueilli|accueillie} à l'entrée, n'est qu'une brute sans cervelle à l'égo démesuré. Quant à sa veuve, elle n'a même pas attendu que son corps refroidisse pour s'envoler vers la Gueule sur le yacht familial... accompagnée de cinq jeunes gaillards taillés comme des dieux. »
languages.original_text: "It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."

traits.locale_text: « Ça me rend malade de voir qu'un homme d'une telle trempe n'a laissé derrière lui qu'un tas de rebuts de l'humanité. Son fils est un ivrogne dépourvu du moindre courage. Daggen, son soi-disant ami qui vous a {mf|accueilli|accueillie} à l'entrée, n'est qu'une brute sans cervelle à l'égo démesuré. Quant à sa veuve, elle n'a même pas attendu que son corps refroidisse pour s'envoler vers la Gueule sur le yacht familial... accompagnée de cinq jeunes gaillards taillés comme des dieux. »

languages.text: "Böyle büyük bir adamın ardında bir yığın insan müsveddesinden başka bir şey bırakmamış oluşu midemi bulandırıyor. Oğlu âciz bir ayyaş. Sizi girişte karşılayan 'arkadaşı' Daggen, egosundan burnunun ucunu göremeyen ahmağın teki. Dul kalmış karısı, adamcağızın daha bedeni soğumadan aile yatına atlayıp boylu poslu, yakışıklı ve genç beş eşlikçisiyle beraber Ağız'a doğru ardına bakmadan kaçtı."
languages.original_text: "It's just that I'm sickened by the thought that such a great man has left behind nothing but a pile of human refuse. His son is a drunk and a weakling. His 'friend' Daggen — the one who greeted you at the entrance — is a dim-witted brute with an incredibly bloated ego. His widow made off on the family yacht in the direction of the Maw while his body was still warm — with an entourage of five brawny, good-looking young fellows."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle yüce bir adamın arkasında bir yığın insan şırfıntısından başka bir şey bırakmamış olduğu gerçeği midemi bulandırıyor. Oğlu sarhoş ve güçsüz. Sizi girişte karşılayan 'arkadaşı' Daggen, egosundan burnunun ucunu göremeyen ahmağın teki. Dul kalmış karısı, adamcağızın daha bedeni soğumadan aile yatına atladı ve beş kaslı, yakışıklı ve genç eşlikçisiyle beraber Ağız'a doğru ardına bakmadan kaçtı."
